definitions.text: a common venereal disease caused by the bacterium Neisseria gonorrhoeae; symptoms are painful urination and pain around the urethra
a sharp abrupt noise as if two objects hit together; may be repeated

examples: The judge clapped him in jail

definitions.text: cause to strike the air in flight
examples: The big bird clapped its wings

definitions.text: clap one's hands or shout after performances to indicate approval

examples: The children were clapping to the music
the wings of the birds clapped loudly

definitions.text: strike with the flat of the hand; usually in a friendly way, as in encouragement or greeting
strike together so as to produce a sharp percussive noise
